Name: Average time from SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Total time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to occur after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and ending with SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average time until SW-AE Assign Reviewers is performed after SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment when followed by SW-EIC Reject compared to when followed by SW-EIC Major Revision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where at least one reviewer declined before agreement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-AE Recommendation overdue in relevant variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to transition to any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection, SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that proceed directly to editor assignment without delays
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex revision paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the first reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1) in cases involving delayed reviewer assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
